service.sql:
select convert(varchar(200), model) cn, sum(not_tax_inclusive_price) ntip1, sum(win_bid_gross_profit_amount) wbgpa2, sum(win_bid_gross_profit_amount) / nullif(sum(not_tax_inclusive_price),0) mll3, sum(win_bid_silicon_steel_price) wbssp4, sum(win_bid_silicon_steel_amount) wbssa5, sum(win_bid_ele_copper_price) wbiop8, sum(win_bid_ele_copper_amount) wbioa9, sum(win_bid_insulating_oil_price) wwbrsp10, sum(win_bid_insulating_oil_amount) wbrsa11, sum(win_bid_cardboard_price) wbcp12, sum(win_bid_cardboard_amount) wbca13, sum(win_bid_rolled_steel_price) wbcp14, sum(win_bid_rolled_steel_amount) wbca15,
sum(win_bid_casing_unit_price) wbcup1, sum(win_bid_casing_quantity) wbcq2, sum(win_bid_switch_unit_price) wbsup3, sum(win_bid_number_of_switches) wbnos4, sum(win_bid_cooler_unit_price) wbcup5, sum(win_bid_number_of_cooler) wbnoc6, sum(win_bid_online_monitoring_unit_price) wbomup7, sum(win_bid_online_monitoring_quantity) wbomq8,
sum(win_bid_other_material_cost) womc16, sum(labour_cost) lc, sum(manufacturing_cost) mc, sum(win_bid_material_total) wbmt17 from JYGK_SDDB_WIN_BIDDING_ORDER_DETAILS where company_name in ${dwmcs} group by model

select convert(varchar(200), model) cn, sum(not_tax_inclusive_price) ntip1, sum(op_gross_profit_amount) ogpa2, sum(op_gross_profit_amount) / nullif(sum(not_tax_inclusive_price),0) mll3, sum(op_quantity_of_silicon_steel) wbssp4, sum(op_unit_price_of_silicon_steel) wbssa5, sum(op_copper_price) wbiop8, sum(op_amount_of_copper) wbioa9, sum(op_unit_price_of_transformer_oil) wwbrsp10, sum(op_transformer_oil_consumption) wbrsa11, sum(op_cardboard_unit_price) wbcp12, sum(op_amount_of_cardboard) wbca13, sum(op_steel_price) wbcp14, sum(op_steel_dosage) wbca15,
sum(op_casing_unit_price) ocup1, sum(op_casing_quantity) ocq2, sum(op_switch_unit_price) osup3, sum(op_number_of_switches) onos4, sum(op_cooler_unit_price) ocup5, sum(op_number_of_cooler) onoc6, sum(op_online_monitoring_unit_price) oomup7, sum(op_online_monitoring_quantity) oomq8,
sum(op_other_materials) womc16, sum(op_labor_cost) olc, sum(op_production_costs) opc, sum(op_total_tax_material) wbmt17 from JYGK_SDDB_ORDER_EXECUTION_DETAILS where company_name in ${dwmcs} group by model

select convert(varchar(200), model) cn, sum(not_tax_inclusive_price) ntip1, sum(actual_gross_profit) ogpa2, sum(actual_gross_profit) / nullif(sum(not_tax_inclusive_price),0) mll3, sum(actual_price_of_silicon_steel) wbssp4, sum(actual_amount_of_silicon_steel) wbssa5, sum(copper_price) wbiop8, sum(actual_electrolytic_copper_consumption) wbioa9, sum(actual_transformer_oil_unit_price) wwbrsp10, sum(actual_transformer_oil_consumption) wbrsa11, sum(actual_insulation_board_price) wbcp12, sum(actual_insulation_board_usage) wbca13, sum(actual_steel_price) wbcp14, sum(actual_steel_consumption) wbca15,
sum(casing_unit_price) cup1, sum(casing_quantity) cq2, sum(switch_unit_price) sup3, sum(number_of_switches) nos4, sum(cooler_unit_price) cup5, sum(number_of_cooler) noc6, sum(online_monitoring_unit_price) omup7, sum(online_monitoring_quantity) omq8,
sum(actual_cost_of_other_materials) womc16, sum(actual_labor_cost) alc, sum(actual_manufacturing_cost) amc, sum(total_material_cost) wbmt17 from JYGK_SDDB_ORDER_COMPLETION_DETAILS where company_name in ${dwmcs} group by model

ExcelTemplate.sheet: 公司型号订单完工三单对比分析表

controller.list: 型号,合同金额,项目阶段,毛利额,毛利率,硅钢,硅钢,电解铜,电解铜,变压器油,变压器油,纸板,纸板,钢材,钢材,套管,套管,开关,开关,冷却器,冷却器,在线监测,在线监测 ,其他材料成本,人工费用,制造费用,材料成本总计
型号,合同金额,项目阶段,毛利额,毛利率,单价,用量,单价,用量,单价,用量,,单价,用量,单价,用量,单价,用量,单价,用量,单价,用量,单价,用量,其他材料成本,人工费用,制造费用,材料成本总计

response.name: ${request.dStart.asString}到${request.dEnd.asString}公司型号订单完工三单对比分析表.xls

map.value: 公司型号订单完工三单对比分析表
